Brief about Jim Duncan:

The Jim Duncan Scholarships was recognized by a graduate along with a follower of the University, to offer monetary support to students who are returning to education once an extended break, or who are resuming their studies at the University of Aberdeen after a break in studies.

  Eligibility of Jim Duncan Scholarship

  • All applicants, regardless of nationality or fee status, applying to the University of Aberdeen for a full-time, undergraduate degree starting in September 2024 after having a break in the education of more than a year.
  • Applicants must be in receipt of a conditional or unconditional offer of entry for September 2024.
  • Any full-time undergraduate students who are resuming their studies in September 2024 at the University of Aberdeen after an interruption of one or more years.

Criteria

The scholarship will be awarded based on monetary want and academic potential

 Application Procedure

Those wishing to be considered for Jim Duncan Scholarship in 20241 /22 should submit an application to the University of Aberdeen using the application form

Please note, the University also offers a range of scholarships through its Entrance Scholarship Scheme. Applicants are authorized to apply to this scheme in addition to the Jim Duncan scholarship noted above but must complete the separate online application form. Students are only permitted to take up one scholarship from all of those offered by the University of Aberdeen prior to the commencement of study.

 Steps to apply for Jim Duncan Scholarship 2024

  • Goto Aberdeen University Scholarship
  • Select the scholarship link
  • Fill the required form
  • Click submit

Fixed Fee Structure

Undergraduate Arts Degree

An international student starting our undergraduate Master of Arts in Business administration in September 2024 would give their tuition fees as follows:

  • Year 1- £18,000
  • Year 2 – £18,000 (no raise in the bill)
  • Year 3 – £18,000 (no increase in fees)
  • Year 4 – £18,000 (no raise in fees)
  • The total cost of schooling for a four-year degree is £72,000.

Undergraduate Engineering Degree

An international student starting our Bachelor of Engineering in September 2024 would pay their tuition fees as follows:

  • Year 1- £20,700
  • Year 2- £20,700 (no increase in fees)
  • Year 3- £20,700 (no increase in fees)
  • Year 4- £20,700 (no increase in fees)
  • The total cost of study for a year’s degree is £82,800.
